page.title: 08A DAY IN THE LIFE OF-
page.content:
by PETER BURDEN
On Saturday 1st.June our friends went back to Brighton. They left Northchapel at 10.30a.m.After that I watched Grandstand on television.At 3.00.o'clock I had my hair cut and after that I went to my Nanny Burdens. Then I went to Lurgashall fete and the barn dance.We got home to bed at 12.40.a.m.
by ADAM MASTERTON
Yesterday I went with Ian and his family to Fontwell and Pagham beach.At Fontwell race track me and Ian went on some motor bikes and Dan had a go on a little motor bike.He could not reach the pedals.Then we went to Pagham beach.
